model

Class Assignment

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Piece
      • model.Item
        • model.Assignment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<Assignment>

    public class Assignment
extends Item
implements Comparable<Assignment>
    This class represents the Assignments pieces that must be obtained by the player to end the game. This class is a representation of an Item leaf and is added to the player's container when it is picked up by the player. The player's aim is to collect all the required assignments pieces to complete the game.
    Author:
    Harman (singhharm1)

      • getId

      • addTo

        public boolean addTo(Player player,
                     Location location)
        Description copied from class: Item
        Adds itself to the player as well all the items that are in this class' collection. Following the composite pattern, all items in the composite will be added to the player's container provided the player's container has enough space. Location field is used to determine whether or not to remove the item itself from the room.
        Specified by:
        addTo in class Item
        Returns:
        boolean
